issue.title: [CF 1588] Azerite Power Tracking
issue.body:
Is there anyway to make an Azerite Power Tracking icon with a %? I don't like the default wow xp/azerite bar. Thanks :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Talason84891 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1588 | Raw

comments.body:
Don't think there is without LUA.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
